descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#00ff00][size=3][b][font=Verdana]
Before we start, I want to say a big [color=#ff0000]THANK YOU![/color] to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/663989/]bronze316[/url] for amazing [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15983/]TrueVision ENB[/url]
that gave me a possibility to make a screenshots for this mod.[/font][/b][/size][/color][/center][font=Tahoma][size=4]
[center][font=Tahoma][size=4][size=6]**[font=Tahoma][size=4][font=Tahoma][size=4][size=6]*[/size][/size][/font][/size][/font][/size][/size][/font][/center][/size][/font][font=Tahoma][size=5][color=#ffff00][color=#ffffff][center][color=#ffff00]Fel'Nin[/color] for Skyrim v1.0 Eng/Rus
[font=Tahoma][size=5][color=#ffff00][color=#ffffff][color=#00ff00][size=4]SE version is available [url=https://old.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/14273]HERE[/url][/size][/color][/color][/color][/size][/font][/center][/color][/color][/size][/font]
[font=Tahoma][size=3][color=#1e84cc]
[/color][color=#ffff00]Author:[/color]
Ronnie Magnum - meshes, textures, location

[color=#ffff00]Requirements:[/color]
Skyrim

[color=#ffff00]Description:[/color]
This mod adds new weapon - Fel'Nin (can be translated like "Wild Sting") - a sword, that san be obtained at the Dosum Coast Ruins, new location that is West from Orphan's Tear shipwreck.

[color=#ffff00]Weapon stats:[/color]
Type: 1-handed sword
Weight: 15
Damage: base 13, crit 7
Reach: 1.0
Speed: 1.0
Enchantment: None
Improvement: Quicksilver ingot, optimal perk - Elven smithing

[size=3][center][size=4][size=4][size=6]***[/size][/size][/size][/center]
[size=4]
Also:[/size]

Wanna see my another Skyrim mods? Check my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2931683]Skyrimnexus page[/url].

Join me on my [url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/RonnieMagnumModsAndOther/]Facebook group[/url] to be updated about my upcoming mods.

On my [url=http://ronnietheblacksmith.deviantart.com/]Deviantart page[/url]...

Or join me on [url=https://www.patreon.com/RonnieMagnum/overview]Patreon[/url] if you like my works![/size]
[/size][/font]
author: Ronnie Magnum
